description:
The instructions in nova/tests/functional/api_samples/README.rst say to run "GENERATE_SAMPLES=True tox -epy27 nova.tests.unit.integrated", but that path doesn't exist anymore.  

Running "GENERATE_SAMPLES=True tox -e functional" seems to work, but someone who knows more than me should double-check that.

It looks like this was missed when a bunch of functional tests were moved into nova/tests/functional.
title: instructions for rebuilding API samples are wrong

comments.content:
The instructions in nova/tests/functional/api_samples/README.rst say to run "GENERATE_SAMPLES=True tox -epy27 nova.tests.unit.integrated", but that path doesn't exist anymore.  

Running "GENERATE_SAMPLES=True tox -e functional" seems to work, but someone who knows more than me should double-check that.

It looks like this was missed when a bunch of functional tests were moved into nova/tests/functional.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cbf123

comments.content: GENERATE_SAMPLES=True tox -e functional work for me
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~liyingjun

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/147737
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=260263db4172cacd10ce12d81bcf2f76b1ad474d
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 260263db4172cacd10ce12d81bcf2f76b1ad474d
Author: liyingjun <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jan 16 11:17:40 2015 +0800

    Fix wrong instructions for rebuilding API samples
    
    The instructions in nova/tests/functional/api_samples/README.rst say to
    run "GENERATE_SAMPLES=True tox -epy27 nova.tests.unit.integrated", but
    that path doesn't exist anymore.
    
    It looks like this was missed when a bunch of functional tests were
    moved into nova/tests/functional.
    
    Running "GENERATE_SAMPLES=True tox -e functional" instead.
    
    Change-Id: If7429244f09ddc7a6b4ef211cc617d99585d06cb
    Closes-bug: #1410924
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
